price: 29. Wuxuu iga habaabiyey waanada13, intuu ii yimid kaddib. Shaydaanna wuxuu hagradaa dadka oo uga tagaa meel xun14 oo hungo ah.
arabic: لَّقَدۡ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَنِيۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولٗا
footnotes:
13. Wuxuu ula jeedaa Qur’aanka ama Xusidda Alle.
 14. Wuu isaga tagaa oo cidla’ uga dhaqaaqaa markuu lumiyo kaddib oo u horseedo xumaanta.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: laqad aḍallanī ʿani al-dhik'ri baʿda idh jāanī wakāna al-shayṭānu lil'insāni khadhūlan
